question: Which Indian football player is nicknamed as "Sikkimese Sniper"?
explanation: Bhaichung Bhutia is nicknamed as "Sikkimese Sniper". Bhaichung Bhutia is a former Indian professional footballer who played as a striker. Bhutia is considered the torchbearer of Indian football in the international arena. He is often nicknamed the Sikkimese Sniper because of his shooting skills in football. Three-time Indian Player of the Year I. M. Vijayan described Bhutia as "God's gift to Indian football".
